Professional Summary 
Dedicated B.Pharm professional with expertise in medical coding, pharmacology, and 
healthcare compliance. Proficient in ICD-10, CPT, and HCPCS coding with a strong 
understanding of medical terminologies, disease classification, and healthcare reimbursement 
processes. Skilled in clinical data abstraction, regulatory compliance, and documentation 
accuracy to ensure proper claim processing and minimize denials. Experienced in drug safety 
reporting, ADR monitoring, and case processing, contributing to efficient healthcare services.
